name: Harry Truman Your Spirit Lives On
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
Artist: Ron Allen and Steve Asplund
Song: harry truman your spirit lives on

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]C[/ch]
Weeks and weeks of anticipation waiting for the mountain to blow
[ch]Am[/ch]                             [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dm[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
But old Harry Truman made his declaration no way in hell was he gonna go
[ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]                         [ch]F[/ch]                              [ch]C[/ch]
If I leave my home i'll die in a week, this mountain is where I burried my wife
[ch]Am[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]Dm[/ch]                          [ch]G[/ch]
I've got plenty of booze and there is fish in the creek, i'm staying here the rest of my life

[Chorus]
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit lake is gone
[ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Dm[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]Db[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit will live on and on

[Verse]
[ch]Db[/ch]                     [ch]Ab[/ch]                [ch]Gb[/ch]                           [ch]Db[/ch]
Finally one day in the middle of may the mountain started breaking in two
[ch]Bbm[/ch]                        [ch]Ab[/ch]                          [ch]Ebm[/ch]              [ch]Ab[/ch]
When she started runbling, trees started crumbling and old St Helen she blew
[ch]Db[/ch]                       [ch]Ab[/ch]                         [ch]Gb[/ch]                [ch]Db[/ch]
Rocks started flying and people they were trying to run but it was to late
[ch]Bbm[/ch]                            [ch]Ab[/ch]                   [ch]Ebm[/ch]                    [ch]Ab[/ch]
The sky was so black that when people looked back, they couldn't see their face

[Chorus]
[ch]Db[/ch]           [ch]Bbm[/ch]       [ch]Ebm[/ch]             [ch]Ab[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit lake is gone
[ch]Db[/ch]          [ch]Bbm[/ch]        [ch]Ebm[/ch]         [ch]Ab[/ch]          [ch]Db[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit will live on and on

[Verse]
[ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]                     [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]
The rocks and mud made a terrible thud as they swallowed up Spirit Lake
[ch]Bm[/ch]                       [ch]A[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]
Mother natures child had just gone wild and she's suposed to be a saint

[Chorus/Outro]
[ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit lake is gone
[ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit will live on and on
[ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit will live on and on
[ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
Oh Harry Truman, your spirit will live on and on

PLEASE USE G MAJOR CHORD - 355433

[Intro]
[ch]Em[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]
It was just fine
            [ch]Am[/ch]
We lived in peace 
            [ch]B7[/ch]
Looked to a happy ending
[ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
The days were bright
                 [ch]Am[/ch]
They shone like gold
           [ch]B7[/ch]
Every step ascending 


[Verse 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
Our dreams came true
             [ch]Am[/ch]
Our path was clear
                 [ch]B7[/ch]               [ch]Em[/ch]  
The moon watched safely from above
          [ch]C[/ch]
But every smile
           [ch]Am[/ch] 
Is not the same
          [ch]B7[/ch]
And every heart's not filled with.....

[ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Love for mankind
[ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]B7[/ch]
Look around it's getting very hard to find
[ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]B7[/ch]
Not every open wound is simply healed by time
    [ch]F#[/ch]
But revenge is always sweet 
[ch]F#[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]
And chaos is the prize


[Verse 2]
[ch]Cm/G[/ch]
Feel it everywhere and you see it growing
[ch]G[/ch]
Enemies arise and the hate is flowing
                        [ch]Cm/G[/ch]
Shattering the moon and bloodying the sky
[ch]Cm/G[/ch]
The machines of war will fuel both sides
[ch]G[/ch]
And the greed will only grow more lies 
[ch]Cm/G[/ch]                                   [ch]B7[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]
Farewell to days of peace cuz now it's time to die

[Intro]
[ch]F[/ch]                      [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
There’s a day when our hearts will be broken
[ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
When a shadow will cast out the light
[ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]
And our eyes cry a million tears
[ch]Bb[/ch]
Help won’t arrive

[Verse 1]
[ch]F[/ch]                      [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]
There’s a day when our courage collapses
[ch]F[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]
And our friends turn and leave us behind
[ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
Creatures of darkness will triumph
[ch]Bb[/ch]
The sun won’t rise
           [ch]F[/ch]
When we've lost all hope
        [ch]Dm/F[/ch]
And succumb to fear
        [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]
And the skies rain blood
        [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Em[/ch]
And the end draws near

[Chorus]
[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I may fall
    [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Bm[/ch]               [ch]Em[/ch]
But not like this, it won’t be by your hand
[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I may fall
[ch]D[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]
Not this place, not today
[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I may fall
         [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
Bring it all, it's not enough to take me down
[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]
I may fall

[Verse 2]
[ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]
There’s a place where we’ll stand outnumbered
          [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
Where the wolves and the soul-less will rise
[ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
In the time of our final moments
[ch]Bb[/ch]
Every dream dies
[ch]F[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Am[/ch]
There’s a place where our shields will lay shattered
[ch]F[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]
And the fear's all that's left in our hearts
[ch]Dm[/ch]                   [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]      
Our strength and our courage have run out
   [ch]Bb[/ch]
We fall apart
        [ch]F[/ch]
When we lose our faith
       [ch]Dm/F[/ch]
And forsake our friends
         [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
When the moon is gone
          [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Em[/ch]
And we've reached our end


[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I may fall
[ch]D[/ch] [ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch]
[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
[ch]D[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]

[ch]D[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch]

[ch]Am[/ch]

[Verse 3]
NC
There’s a moment that changes a life when
NC
We do something that no one else can
NC
And the path that we’ve taken will lead us
NC
One final stand
[ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]
There’s a moment we make a decision
[ch]F[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
Not to cower and crash on the ground
[ch]Dm[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]

[ch]Bb[/ch]
Our courage found
        [ch]F[/ch]
When we stand with friends
       [ch]Dm/F[/ch]
And we won’t retreat
      [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
As we stare down death
         [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Em[/ch]
Then the taste is sweet

[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]

VERSE
         [ch]C[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
Your love is like a fountain
          [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]

               [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]

         [ch]Dm7[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]Gsus4[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]

                 [ch]C[/ch]                                [ch]G[/ch]

2.    Keeps me humble down on my knees

                   [ch]Dm7[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]Gsus4[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]C/E[/ch]
